title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Innovation in Identity Security: how we protect the cloud & help you do it too
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 身份安全创新：我们如何保护云并帮助您也做到这一点
abstract: Learn how AWS approaches identity as the foundation of cloud security, both for protecting AWS and enabling customer security. This session explores how AWS strengthens identity across the stack through secure-by-default design, core security mechanisms, API testing and formal verification. You'll discover innovations in access management and identity security that help organizations operate securely at scale. Capital One will present on how they have implemented AWS identity services and data perimeter controls. Walk away with practical identity security approaches for your organization.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何将身份作为云安全的基础，既保护AWS自身，也为客户安全提供支持。本次会议探讨AWS如何通过默认安全设计、核心安全机制、API测试和形式化验证在整个技术栈中强化身份安全。您将了解访问管理和身份安全方面的创新，帮助组织大规模安全运营。Capital One将介绍他们如何实施AWS身份服务和数据边界控制。您将获得适用于您组织的实用身份安全方法。
